abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Paul Shaffer and band play instrumental medley of inductees' music --  Bob Krasnow introduces Ahmet Ertegun -- Ahmet Ertegun speech -- Jann Wenner speaks -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Chuck Berry -- Keith Richards inducts Chuck Berry -- Chuck Berry acceptance speech
